clues.clue: Ok! Let's get started.  Your first give is located in a place FULL of things that are one of your favorite things to do!
Great work young padiwan!  Your next destination on this hunt is a place sometimes dark and scary.  You need to look within a container that has shooting devices.
Ok that was a bit of a trick! But we need to keep you on your toes. This next one will be exciting.  You only need to look where batteries go from 0 to 100 overnight.
Getting close to the end now your apprentice.  The next treasure can be found where clicks are heard, and little black dots are read.

Phew, ok last one.  This is a place that you should probably never go without a certain person's permission (hint: he wears glasses and likes to watch American Pickers).  But you can go there now, and look in a place where he keeps all his troves of widsdom.
